name: Puff, The Magic TV Remote: One Toke Too Far
name_original: Puff, The Magic TV Remote: One Toke Too Far
description:
*This project is a prototype for a larger game, development status tbc*

Experience a hybrid of brawler based game-play and tower defense strategy in this prototype project from ThatGuy&Co. Our hero, Roy Minoi, is at home, watching live music and 'chillin'. After one too many joints, Roy finds himself pulled into his TV, only to land on the stage and squash the leading act. The fan-girls are outraged!

Help Roy survive wave after wave of demonic fangirls using CRT TVs and Extendotron 2000 Extension Leads to help hold the girls at bay. Upgrade your health, damage and speed to help you stay ahead of the seemingly endless horde and survive the nightmare until the trip wears off.
